Articles.Content:
![D2QyFp0.png](http://i.imgur.com/D2QyFp0.png)

DALA (Dual Astronaut Low Altitude) is a new plane designed, built, and flown by me! It can reach up to speeds of 240 m/s in air and can take off the runway at 70m/s. It has a dual cockpit design to allow two pilots at once, with one cockpit allowing for more of a correct view on the prograde marker while the other allows for great views of both the sky and land.

![rfh5Ami.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/rfh5Ami.jpg)

![XoqwkxP.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/XoqwkxP.jpg)

![PoLGZYp.png](http://i.imgur.com/PoLGZYp.png)

Reaching altitudes of 30,000 meters, but grows more unstable as the altitude increases. I hope you enjoy this craft. Link for download is below, and if you have any questions, comments, or ideas, than put them below. Anyway, thank you very much, and I will see you when I see you! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

[Download Here!](http://www./download/t51dvs7jf1p2n3u/DA-Low_Altitude.craft)
